name: 快乐蓝熊HappyBlueBear
description: Happy Blue Bear is a platformer game with adventurous jumping. Developers “handmade” all levels, hope to make you feel relaxed and at ease while playing it.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 57 MB available space
